title: 【崩溃了】Ticking entity，求大佬帮帮忙
author: tcangao
txt_content:
玩着玩着就游戏崩溃，把我弹出去了，之后启动器弹出来弹出了这个提示框
The game crashed whilst ticking entity
Error: java.lang.NullPointerException: Ticking entity
以下是崩溃报告：

---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
WARNING: coremods are present:
  BetterFoliageLoader (更好的树叶-MC1.12-2.2.0.jar)
  ForgelinPlugin (更好的树叶前置-1.8.2.jar)
  LoadingPlugin (加载动画-MC1.12-1.2.jar)
  Inventory Tweaks Coremod ([1.12.2]InventoryTweaks-1.63.jar)
  DynamicSurroundingsCore (DynamicSurroundings-core-1.12.2-3.5.4.3.jar)
Contact their authors BEFORE contacting forge

replies.author: mine新时代xs
replies.txt_content:
在config文件夹中找到forge.cfg
将
B:removeErroringEntities=false
B:removeErroringTileEntities=false复制代码
改为
B:removeErroringEntities=true
B:removeErroringTileEntities=true复制代码
即可解决问题

replies.author: tcangao
replies.txt_content:
